storyInfo: On a mission not long after being hired by Rhodes Island, Scavenger is surprised to meet a personal foe who once screwed her over.

attributes.text: This is the girl who smashed my window?
Hrm. If she was breaking and entering, then we should confiscate everything on her and throw her out to the wastes. Those are the rules of the community.
But all she stole was a piece of dried cheese from the storeroom. Hey, you, what was your name again?
Hamelin... How about this, Hamelin: I'll toss a coin to decide your fate.
If it's tails, you'll be banished. But if it's heads, I'll let you off.

attributes.content: Reporting in.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Day... seven.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: More deceased got disposed of this morning. Likely extreme Originium particulate density in the building. Conditions for the Infected are turning south fast.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: For the past 24 hours, haven't seen any workers in any area not covered by walls, let alone leaving the factory.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Comms pick up heavy interference when I get even slightly closer.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: High-voltage network all around outside. No way to locate the control room for now.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Got the exterior patrol shifts and movement patterns down. Can't work out the guards inside yet.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: I want to get this crap over with. If you give the go, I can take the most violent option.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Hmph... Fine, Rhodes Island does things its own way. Copy.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Plan B? The factory's waste transporter goes down to the basement every morning at three. They stop running the sewer pipes in the meantime.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Simple enough to get through, as long as I get a gas mask.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: I'm only responsible for paralyzing the security systems here, anyway. Not my job to provide followup support or guidance, right?
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: ...I know. I can do this less cleanly, if it comes to it. Figured that's why you called me for this in the first place.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: End of report.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Insane how Rhodes Island actually wants to save Infected. What an employer.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: That's the sound of the transporter starting up... It's go time.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Ugh—
attributes.name: Factory Guard

attributes.content: Lights out, bozo.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Security system here seems almost as complex as a prison. Whatever, it practically is one anyway.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Need to find the control room before I tip anyone off—
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Watch it!
Huh?
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Any further and you'll trip the automated—
—What? You?
...Tulio.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: 'Scavenger'. Heh, didn't think you were still kicking.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: What're you doing here? Guessing you've been dragging that weapon with you through the sewer pipes, huh, li'l rat?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: —Hold on, lower your blade, let's talk this out. Else I'll sound the alarm.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: The system's linked directly to police HQ. They're gonna read any signal from here as an Infected riot.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: You a guard here too?
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Yeah, but trust me, Scavenger—
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Tch. Trust you?
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: I'm betting we're after the same thing. I saw you knock that guy out. You're looking for a way out, aren't you?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: 'Cause I want out too, or else I wouldn't have stopped you just now.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: *Sigh* I'm serious, I turned a new leaf since all those years ago. Look, I'm Infected now too. I've been through hella shit, I... I understand you.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: You've seen this factory up close. You know how things are here, right?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: They call me a guard, but I'm still just as much a prisoner as anyone else. We're all just as damned here.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Okay, but you're their overseer.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: You know the sweet lies this place cooks up to lure in the Infected... I don't like it either, but we've all gotta get our hands dirty to survive.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: You don't get any sympathy from me, sorry.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Hold on, I haven't gotten to the important part. I know the systems here inside out. You can't get past them without my help.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: There're two watchhound cores monitoring the whole factory at the same time. Throwing the master breaker to cut the surveillance won't get you anywhere either; they'll switch to emergency power, fast.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: You need someone to work with you, and obviously I need someone to help me out. So no matter how much you distrust me, working together's still our best bet.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: I never said I was escaping.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: I know you're wary of me, but—
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: —I'm completing shutting down this place's security system.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: That's the job I took.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: What kinda merc just comes out and spills the job they're on?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Cut the crap. The sooner I'm done, the better. Tell me where the surveillance cores are located.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Alright... so you're agreeing to work together, then? Is that what you mean?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: I know what you're planning, Scavenger. I'm not gonna tell you every route straight away.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Follow me, and keep to the foot of the wall. I've figured out the blind spots.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Is the factory foreman in?
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: He's not. Why would he be? It's three in the morning.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: He only shows up occasionally. What kinda healthy guy would wanna live in a place where the air's filled with Originium?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: So everyone here's Infected?
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Yeah. Not a problem for you, right? You're already Infected, what's a couple more rocks gonna do?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: What about the rest of your crew? I figure they all got their protection on?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: What're you guys after, anyway? There's nothing valuable here, and we don't exactly make high-precision Originium products. Seriously can't figure out why anyone'd rob this place.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: ...Don't feel like answering, huh? You weren't this hard to talk to back when we used to do business.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Although I guess you wouldn't have cut it as a merc if you were the same as before.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Don't waste your breath. Never wanted to work with a piece of shit like you, anyway.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Tch...
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: But we've got no choice for now. We have to split ways from here.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Surveillance core's right over there, through the workshop.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Then we each make our move in ten minutes. I'll find you after. Once we RDV, we head to the master control room and take out the whole system.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: You better have turned that new goddamn leaf.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.text: I actually knew which side that coin would land on, the moment it fell.
Here, give me your hand. I'll teach you the trick. Like this—
It's alright, Hamelin. You might be Infected now, but you don't have to stay that far from me.
That's right, you'll be even further after today... You're leaving tomorrow morning, right?
I'm sorry. I couldn't do anything about it.
We know you got infected so the community could survive, but they won't even let you off for it... I know, you had to take that risk so we could carry on. That's how it's always been.
Take this silver coin—as a memento.
No matter where you are, no matter what happens... I'm here, and I hope you live.

attributes.content: Base station signal screener's already off.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Next, high-voltage network... down. Electric doors... open. Pulling the master breaker.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Done?—
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Tch...! Knew it!
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Asshole! Backstabbing me again?!
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: How the hell does this work out for you?
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Heh. Always gotta try, y'know?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Think you can get away with this? A little shit like you's never gonna fool me twice!
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: What else am I supposed to do? Just sit back and wait for you to take me out?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Neither of us needs the other now. The factory doors are wide open. Of course I'm gonna make the first move instead of being the victim.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: I never said I was gonna kill you.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Duh. Why would you? But in what bizarro universe does this end with you letting me the hell go?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: I'm Infected too. Now I can understand how desperate you were back then... and also how much you must hate me.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: True... never had that many clients I could put a face to.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Tch. Since when did Zalaks have this much strength?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: I told you, you're not getting away with this.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Now don't move, unless you wanna get cut in half.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Tch...
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Let's be clear. Whether or not I kill you right now is entirely up to my mood.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: You... This goddamn Oripathy's making me so weak. How the hell are you still just fine?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: How did you pull this off? You're like a completely different person.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Hmph. Of course you wish I was still that rookie merc. Pure. Gullible.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: I did the dirty work no one else was willing to, and the client never gave a damn thing in return.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: I blacked out from an Oripathy attack, woke up in a ditch, and you know what I found? The few remaining things I had from home, gone, taken just like that.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: You were gonna die sooner or later, so I figured waste not, want not...
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Heh. 'Waste not, want not.'
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Everyone living on the edge exploits each other like that. Isn't that the understanding?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: And what was I supposed to do? Wait for some Infected to die and cause a spreader event right in front of me?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Who knew you'd live? And still be alive today!
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Right... That's probably because I have someone who hopes I live.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: When I woke up, I still had that silver coin sewn into my clothes. It was still there. That's why I decided to live on.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: You really know how to hang onto life, rat. What could one silver buy you?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: I never spent it. Never will.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Then how did you...?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: The same way you got tricked into this factory, thinking there'd be a stable enough life for an Infected here. But what you got instead were vile living conditions and inhumane treatment.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: What I went through didn't stop there. Might've been even worse. But that's life for you.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: The hell are you saying to me...? Acting like we're in the same boat.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: We're all in the same goddamn boat.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Fine, I get it. Bet I look like the punchline of a joke to you now, huh? Must be nice, getting your revenge. No wonder you're in such a good mood.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Pssh... You think way too much.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Yeah, and it's all your fault I'm in this mess anyway!
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Because I hired your Infected mercenary ass, it didn't take long for me to get symptoms too. I should've just stayed away from you and your kind!
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Alright, get this through your skull. Touching the Infected isn't gonna give you Oripathy just like that.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: You think I'd believe that?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: No skin off my nose if you don't, but that's my current employer's view. I've gotta tell you on their behalf.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Oh... Now I get why you wanted me to work with you, even though you were scared of me getting payback.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: You were gonna have me bust you out, then dispose of me to complete this imaginary 'revenge' of yours. Your whole 'waste not, want not.'
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Ha, like you weren't thinking the same thing? Weren't you biding your time with me, just so you could make your move now?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: So why're we still blabbering? Need me to teach you how they handle the Infected they kill here?
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: No. I only cooperated with you so I could finish my mission a little faster.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: I can cope with shitawful work environments, and that includes shitawful coworkers. I don't think the way you do.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Besides, my mission was to aid and rescue the Infected, and you're one of them.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Rescue the Infected? You're shitting me.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Whatever. Ask my employer.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Reporting in.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Factory security system paralyzed, but foreman not on site.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Um, I don't care how you guys extract the Infected. Maybe you're taking them somewhere or whatever. I just wanna confirm if my mission's complete or not.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Factory guards are also Infected. You rescuing them too?
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: ...So, I can handle problems my own way here.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Understood. I'll withdraw to the designated site ASAP.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: End of report.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Hmph. Sounds like they're actually making good on what they said.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Never imagined I'd find such a trustworthy client. Let alone anyone who takes the Infected seriously.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: ...Just like how her wish could never come true.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: —Anyway, you heard that. They gave me some leeway.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: Damn, you really don't care about anything except what your employer wants.
attributes.name: Tulio

attributes.content: Think what you like. I'll toss a coin to decide your fate, then.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.content: If it's tails, I clean up the trash here and now; if it's heads, I let you off, and give you one more chance to start over, like the other Infected.
attributes.name: Scavenger

attributes.text: Scavenger slides out a tiny silver coin, and flings it into the air.
Many a time, alone with no one to turn to, she's shut her eyes and entrusted it all to the result of a coin toss.
'Maybe one day, when you're not using every ounce of your strength just to survive, you'll get to decide where it is you want to go.'
She doesn't know whether a day like that comes for people like her.
But this time, she knows what the coin will answer.
